title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 514 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 25, 2011

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 514





	On Friday, February 25, 2011, the President signed into law:
	 
	H.R. 514, the “FISA Sunsets Extension Act of 2011,” which extends certain surveillance authorities included in the USA PATRIOT Act and the Intelligence Reform and Terrorism Prevention Act of 2004.
